title: Help My Account Got Hacked
body: Hi I just tried to log-in to my account today and I found that the email and password to my account got changed. I was able to log-in fine last night. I have never shared the username/password with anyone so I don't know how this happened. I can't log-in to my account to email support. What do I do?

replies.body:
The first thing I'd recommend would be to change the password for the email address that was associated with your account. For even better security, you can enable 2-step verification/authentication if it's a feature your email provides. Next, I'd recommend submitting a support ticket with [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so you don't have to sign in.

Let me know if you have any questions.
